sponsor.partnerMessage: Designer Remodeling Service specializing in Kitchens and Baths. OZKB offers complete remodeling services from start to finish resulting in an unforgettably phenomenal home improvement experience. Serving Northwest Arkansas.

posts.title: The Little Craft Show Coming To Shiloh Square
posts.content:
The spring craft shows keep on coming, and we’re loving it!

  • Premiere fair: The Little Craft Show is returning this Saturday from 11-6p on the Shiloh Square in Springdale. Advertised as “Arkansas’ most talked about indie craft show,” the event will feature local and regional makers, independent artists, and small businesses as well as artists from across the nation. 
  • Vendors: The craft show will take place at the Shiloh Square Pavilion and dozens of makers will be there, so “expect high-quality, handmade products and the cutest booths you’ve ever seen.” There will also be food, drinks, and music to complete the atmosphere. 

Learn more and check out some of the vendors who will be at the event HERE.

posts.title: New Exhibition At The Rogers Historical Museum Begins This Weekend
posts.content:
The Rogers Historical Museum is presenting a new exhibit starting this Saturday, May 7, called “Civil War in Benton County: Untold Stories.” 

  • The civilian side: Civil War narratives are often about the military aspects of the war, but according to a researcher for the exhibit, there is much to learn about the civilian side. In the exhibition, you will learn about true stories of bushwhacker attacks, food shortages, and other daily life challenges for Benton County civilians. 
  • What survived: The exhibit will be on show in the Trammel Gallery May 7-November 12 and will feature several artifacts from Benton County that survived the war including letters, documents, and clothing. The Rogers Historical Museum is located at 313 S. 2nd St. and is open Tuesday-Saturday 10-4p. 

Learn more HERE.

posts.title: NWA's Specialized Real Estate Group Earns 3 Fitwel Stars For South Yard Lofts
posts.content:
A local real estate group has earned the first-in-Arkansas Fitwel certification at its new mixed-use development, South Yard Lofts in Fayetteville. 

  • 3 stars: Fitwel is the world’s leading certification system and is committed to building healthy environments for all people. Specialized Real Estate Group's South Yard Lofts have earned a 3-star rating from Fitwel, which is their most prestigious. 
  • Stacked: NWA’s Specialized “builds healthy places and connects neighbors through exceptional real estate development and property management.” Specialized has led the way on a plethora of green and sustainable initiatives and won numerous awards in the past 10 years, but the Fitwel certification is the best yet by far. 

Learn more about the South Yard Lofts HERE.

posts.title: Walton Executive MBA Program Invites Professionals To Hone And Expand Skills
posts.topic: Sponsored by the Walton MBA Program at the University of Arkansas
posts.photoCredit: Walton MBA Program at the University of Arkansas
posts.content:
Transform your life and accelerate your career:

  • Look sharp: Through the Walton Executive MBA program, you’ll hone your leadership skills, expand your expertise in core business fields, travel the world in our global immersion experience, and make life-long connections with classmates and alumni. Your life and career will never be the same.
  • Designed for you: Mostly online, with only one in-person Saturday each month, this program is designed to accommodate the busy schedule of a working professional. There’s never been a better time than right now. Apply before July 1. 

Learn more HERE.

posts.title: Railyard Live Season Kicks Off Today, Weather Permitting
posts.content:
The Railyard Live 2022 season is scheduled to kick off today with a Cinco de Mayo event featuring authentic music, food, and dance. 

  • Fiesta: The Cinco de Mayo event will begin at 6p, weather permitting, and feature dances by Chinelos Morelenses Unidos de Arkansas and Ballet Folklorico Herencia de Mexico. There will also be musical performances by Mariachi Amistad and MC Papa Rap. 
  • All together: Beverages and tasty treats will be available from Food Truck de El Chefe, Smok’d TX BBQ, Yeyo’s Mezcaleria, and Lo-Intervention by Onyx. The 2022 Railyard Live season is scheduled from May 5 to September 24 and general admission is free, though registration is required. 

Learn more and register HERE. If the weather doesn't cooperate, you can always check out our authentic Mexican food guide to get your Cinco de Mayo on.

pick.title: NWA Daily Picks
pick.content:
• Reduce drafts: Boost your home comfort with no-cost air and duct sealing from SWEPCO.*
  • Coffee: Another Starbucks location is in the world in Springdale. 
  • Farming: An Arkansas Grown Grant pilot program will offer to fund local farmers. 
  • Local politics: Here’s what the SCOTUS leak could mean in Arkansas. 
  • Arts school: There’s a new arts-based preschool called Preschool for the Creative Arts in Fort Smith. 
  • Specials: The Foodology Food Truck is doing a kitchen takeover at Moonbroch in Rogers today for Cinco de Mayo!
